name: BlocXstop
description:
In BlocXstop, you should always be on the move; if you stop losing, you must take the key to open the door and complete the level but it will not be so easy because several obstacles will prevent you from completing the level and be careful with the colored blocks, to jump on them you must change color or lose at instant.

Instructions

-Use the arrow keys to move

-Press x to change color

-Press Esc to Exit
